mapper.insert: insert into card( product_id, advertiser_id, integration_num, times, comment, unique_id, create_time, modify_time ) values ( #{card.product_id}, #{card.advertiser_id}, #{card.integration_num}, #{card.times}, #{card.comment}, #{card.unique_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE card SET times = times-1, modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{card.id}
